original_title: Todo, en fin, el silencio lo ocupaba
overview: Carefully shot in black and white, All Things Were Now Overtaken by Silence is a meditation on the filming of a strange play: a fascinating monologue by actress, director, performance artist and political activist Jesusa Rodriguez of Sor Juana Ines de la Cruzâ€™s poem First I Dream.
title: All Things Were Now Overtaken By Silence
